pkgmetadata.longdescription: Run your Bitrise automations with this CLI tool on any Mac or Linux machine, and use the same configuration on bitrise.io (automation service, with a mobile app focus). Part of the Bitrise Continuous Integration, Delivery and Automations Stack, with dev-util/stepman and dev-util/envman. For a nice & quick intro you should check: https://app.bitrise.io/cli
